players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. I'm innocent."
Charlie: "I'll watch both Diana and Bob. Alice, your words don't change my suspicion."
Diana: "Observing everyone's behavior. Stay cautious."
Diana: "Monitoring everyone, be vigilant. Keep the investigation in mind."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. I'm innocent. Let's work together."
Charlie: "Will observe everyone, focusing on Diana and Bob. Stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

Diana: "Monitoring everyone, be vigilant. Keep the investigation in mind."
Alice: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. I'm innocent. Let's work together."
You: "Will observe everyone, focusing on Diana and Bob. Stay vigilant."

Diana was arrested
